mapper.select:
SELECT a.id, a.`name`, a.price, a.content, a.`desc`, DATE_FORMAT(a.reward_punish_time, '%Y-%m-%d') rewardPunishTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') createTime, a.award_unit awardUnit, a.enclosure, b.user_name userName, b.job_number jobNumber, b.state, d.`name` rewardPunishTypeName FROM sys_staff_reward_punish a LEFT JOIN sys_staff_data_dictionary d ON a.type_id = d.id, sys_eve_user_staff b WHERE a.staff_id = b.id
AND a.`name` LIKE '%${name}%'
AND b.user_name LIKE '%${userName}%'
AND b.job_number LIKE '%${jobNumber}%'
AND b.state = #{state}
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_staff_reward_punish (id, reward_punish_time, `name`, price, content, `desc`, type_id, award_unit, enclosure, staff_id, create_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{rewardPunishTime}, #{name}, #{price}, #{content}, #{desc}, #{typeId}, #{awardUnit}, #{enclosureInfo}, #{staffId}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.`name`, a.price, a.content, a.`desc`, DATE_FORMAT(a.reward_punish_time, '%Y-%m-%d') rewardPunishTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') createTime, a.award_unit awardUnit, a.enclosure, a.staff_id staffId, CONCAT_WS('_', c.job_number, c.user_name) staffName, b.user_name userName, b.job_number jobNumber, b.state, a.type_id typeId, d.`name` rewardPunishTypeName FROM sys_staff_reward_punish a LEFT JOIN sys_staff_data_dictionary d ON a.type_id = d.id LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff c ON a.staff_id = c.id, sys_eve_user_staff b WHERE a.staff_id = b.id AND a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.id, a.`name`, a.price, a.content, a.`desc`, DATE_FORMAT(a.reward_punish_time, '%Y-%m-%d') rewardPunishTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') createTime, a.award_unit awardUnit, a.enclosure, b.user_name userName, b.job_number jobNumber, b.state, d.`name` rewardPunishTypeName FROM sys_staff_reward_punish a LEFT JOIN sys_staff_data_dictionary d ON a.type_id = d.id, sys_eve_user_staff b WHERE a.staff_id = b.id AND b.id = #{staffId} ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
